website_summaries.verdict: The X900F series is loaded with Sony’s premium technologies to produce a smoother, more colorful, and dynamic 4K image, and its range of available sizes makes it a bit easier to adopt and enjoy this premium viewing experience.
pros: Ultra LED Smart TV powered by Android TV
X-Motion Clarity minimizes blur during action scenes
X-tended Dynamic Range PRO delivers a greater range of dark and light contrast
TRILUMINOS Display clearly reproduces more colors than most TVs can handle

website_summaries.verdict: Large screen, striking picture, and decent sound earn this model our top slot. The TV to get for viewers who want the ultimate UHD entertainment experience.
pros: Gorgeous image quality with vibrant colors and excellent contrast
75-inch screen brings action to life and is perfect for watching movies and sports
Also makes a great addition to home theater systems
cons: Expensive but worth it for consumers who want an exceptional UHD TV with a generous screen

website_summaries.verdict: Whether you want a TV that grabs attention as soon as you step in the room or are setting up a home theater, this Sony 75-inch model is likely to exceed your expectations when it comes to sound and picture quality.
pros: Boasts a generous 75-inch screen and 4K Ultra HD resolution
Sony's X-Motion Clarity produces impressive action, especially for gaming
TV has ample inputs for your equipment
cons: A few owners gripe about lag during software downloads and app streaming

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color accuracy
customer_reviews.text: The colors are true and accurate right out of the box. Blu-rays look amazing. I put in Red Sparrow and it blew my mind. Even dvds are tolerable to watch, although not nearly as good as blu-ray. The legs are very heavy and thus very sturdy which is a big plus. The remote is comfortable in the hand. You can't go wrong with this TV.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Great panel ruined by Android TV
customer_reviews.text: This TV has a wonderful panel, but is unfortunately ruined by terrible software. Android TV is extremely slow, buggy and difficult to use. About once a month the TV crashes during use and has to (slowly) reboot. And now, starting today apparently, a giant bar with advertisements appears in the middle of the Home screen! Because paying for the TV is apparently not enough, they want to make more money from their customers through ads. I regret buying a TV with the Android TV OS, and warn everyone to stay far, far away from this platform.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Awful TV, awful customer service from Sony
customer_reviews.text: Worst customer service experience. TV was delivered with shadowing and clouds in the darker screens. Called Sony and they wouldn’t honor their warranty but offered a $50 discount on another tv. Will never buy another Sony TV.... I appreciate getting this through Amazon as their customer service was top notch.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Sony is just better than Samsung - which has circuit board issues
customer_reviews.text: Sony is just better than Samsung - which has circuit board issues. I go to Costco a lot and would have bought Sony there but they do not sell it. They push Vizio and Samsung instead - at a much cheaper price. I want reliability. The picture seems mostly the same. So the issue then becomes - how long will it last?
customer_reviews.author: hmjw9991

customer_reviews.title: Fell out of love quickly
customer_reviews.text: I hate this TV. It's locked at 60hz even at 1080p which is vastly disappointing given the price, especially if you planned on using it for gaming (which it's advertised for.) Only port 2 and 3 accept the full HDMI 2.0 bandwidth which is also troublesome given that if you use port 3 for arc audio (your only option) you're out of luck if anything were to happen to port 2. Also does not support dvi input. I can not understand why this TV is so insanely overpriced for such gimped and overlooked features.
customer_reviews.author: mr. woebegone

customer_reviews.title: Good TV but be careful with price drops, Amazon will not credit.
customer_reviews.text: Really great TV. Best blacks on a LCD I have seen so far. The Android and remote can be slow to respond sometimes but nothing major. I would be careful and make sure you understand that Amazon will not make price adjustments on TV is the price drops later. Price dropped $100 a week after I purchased and they refused to credit me. I find it silly that I can return the tv and repurchase it at the new price (costing them more) but they won’t credit me the difference. I can understand it it was month later, but for that, I rated overall 3 instead of 4.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love this TV...  It's incredible
customer_reviews.text: I love this TV and wish I had bought it months ago when I first saw it. It is the best quality picture I've ever seen.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip

customer_reviews.title: Holy Smokes! It impresses!
customer_reviews.text: This TV is replacing a 73" Mitsubishi DLP (WD-73737 to be exact). When I went from SD to HD 10 years ago, I noticed the difference in quality. You could tell right away when you were on the wrong channel. The change from 1080 to 4K is nothing like that. I've never been sitting at home, watching a movie, and had that "OMG This is amazing" feeling. Nothing on my BluRay on 1080p ever felt like this. Watching 4K content with Dolby Vision is just so striking. I'm glad I bought this TV
customer_reviews.author: Abel Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Android TV and Chromecast built in are bad
customer_reviews.text: Rather than buy Android TV, just buy a television and buy a Chromecast Ultra. Android TV and Chromecast built in are horrible.
customer_reviews.author: BookLover

customer_reviews.title: 6 months old and sound stops working intermittently
customer_reviews.text: We’ve only had this TV 6 months and starting around 4 months the sound would randomly stop working. Now it’s doing this every few days for no reason and it’s extremely frustrating. We either have to toggle sound features on/off or do a hard reboot to fix it, it’s not consistent. This TV has far more problems than other cheaper brand TVs we have in our home, I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellaant mid-sized LED Tv
customer_reviews.text: Set up for the Sony XBR49X900F is easy, straight forward and fast. The picture is great. Colors are clear and vibrant. I wanted an LED that was reasonably priced with 120Hz refresh rate for games yet with a screen size of 50 inches or less. Rather rare as I found out. This one fit those requirements.
customer_reviews.author: Knights Gambit

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: The most beautiful TV picture I've ever seen. Set-up was simple and straight-forward with no picture adjustments necessary to enjoy the vivid images.
customer_reviews.author: Ronm01

customer_reviews.title: Decent Android TV but 100 Mbps Ethernet came as a surprise
customer_reviews.text: Overall quite positive impression. I like picture and device quality. It even managed to more or less work with my receiver - not without tricks though (unfortunately HDMI ARC is always tricky but thanks that it exists). However, 100Mbps ethernet was a blow. They actually never mentioned that in any of their specs. When I saw "100 Mbps Full Duplex" in router monitor I could not believe it. It took me some time to find information on the Internet. So yes, it is true - high end smart tv (android tv), which you are supposed to use for video streaming DOES NOT support 1Gb ethernet.
customer_reviews.author: alik1006

customer_reviews.title: Incredible
customer_reviews.text: Recieved a refund for my defective samsung KS8000 after a two year battle with samsung. Went with this unit and could not be happier. Excellent HDR picture quality from 4K Blu rays via an oppo udp 203. Standard blu rays look amazing as well. The motion handling is superior to anything i have seen from other brands. Only bad thing i can really say is the high input lag from a 1080p console such as the switch. Overall highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: No regrets, price is worth the quality.
customer_reviews.text: The picture is amazing, the tv is built well and looks really cool. This is my first 4K so I’m amazed by the picture quality, I recommend watching Planet Earth 2 in 4K. One thing that I had to do manually is go into the settings menus -> external inputs and select “enhance 4K HDMI signal format”.
customer_reviews.author: Dava

customer_reviews.title: Best TV I have ever owned!!
customer_reviews.text: Best TV I have ever owned!! Such a beautiful picture. First 4K TV for me and the picture is STUNNING!! I highly recommend this TV!! Thank you Sony!! UPDATE: I've had this TV for a little over 2 years now and after tweaking the picture settings I've found from others the picture now is BEYOND STUNNING if that's possible!! So glad I bought it. After 2 years it still blows me away every time I watch it.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Hesitate to Buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought and returned four 65” tvs in the last two months. Two Samsung and two Sony. I would of kept the first Sony but it started making a popping noise. It was a different model than this one. I want what I pay for! This model delivers!!! This model is the only tv I’ve ever had the picture was almost perfect out of the box. After a day I did tweek a little in advanced settings. I am getting a sound bar. Either 9 out of ten actors mumble or it’s me. The sound is clear though. I read negative reviews on loading and using the apps but I didn’t have any trouble. Don’t hesitate to buy.
customer_reviews.author: G's Review

customer_reviews.title: Great looking TV
customer_reviews.text: I got this 65" TV to replace my ca. 2012 55" TCL. The TCL was still performing as well as always but I wanted to see what the hype with Ultra HD and HDR is all about. Well, for me, it is all that and a bag of chips. The picture, from where I sit, is noticeably sharper and the colors are incredible. I don't really need or want any of the smart TV "features" and I really wish somebody would make a device that has this kind of picture quality without any additional fluff or planned future software obsolescence.
customer_reviews.author: CGM

customer_reviews.title: Sony XBR49X900F 49-Inch 4K Ultra HD Smart LED TV (2018 Model)
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this TV from Amazon in October. Price was right and I liked the Sony TV's that I saw at the local BX. Picture was great on all the displays. The delivery was quick, and the packaging was the best I've seen. My wife and I removed the packaging (following written instruction), put the legs on (simple), set it on our console table, wired it easily with pictures and instructions provided, and turned it on. 30 minutes max from the time it came in the door, it was running setup. Love the TV and especially the picture even more now (December 17) than I did at first. No problems, beautiful TV, STUNNING display. Darks are amazing. Stongly recommend Sony.
customer_reviews.author: LesW

customer_reviews.title: Worse purchase ever! So not buy this!
customer_reviews.text: GO with a ROKU or any other TV, but not this one. We bout the 65" in 2018 and have barely used it due to issues with the menu, software sucks, you can't add any apps that are not affiliated with Sony and its an impossible tv to use and I am tech savvy. I have a ROKU the I love! Less expensive, great quality and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Smokey

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed Overall
customer_reviews.text: Despite an excellent picture, I regret this purchase. Shortly after the warranty expired, the HDMI connections began to cause cessation of sound, picture or both. Changed the cable just to be sure, but the problem was in the HDMI connectors --a ll of them. Wiggling the cable could cause the TV to completely stop working, then wiggling it some more would restore functionality, but always and only temporarily. Then we switched to a streaming TV service and dropped cable, thus eliminating the HDMI issue. Shortly there after, the TV began to refuse to turn on at all unless the set was unplugged then plugged back in again. I will not be buying another Sony TV.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C. Artman

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous picture; Buggy Apps and OS
customer_reviews.text: The 4k picture on this TV is stunning, bright, well-saturated and consistent (no banding or dark spots). The apps and Android OS are laggy and buggy and ruin the experience. 5G wifi constantly loses connection and freezes streaming apps, but 2.4 is stable just much slower. Some streaming apps like Spotify that are supposed to wake the tv from sleep if casted from another device don't work, but others do (xmsirius). Spotify and xm sirius seem to constantly lose connections from the casting device and apps need to be restarted. Not worth the aggravation. Remote is very outdated and feels cheap although decently responsive for straight-line IR only.
customer_reviews.author: DavidShopsInVT

customer_reviews.title: Major issue with Oreo update for X900F
customer_reviews.text: Had this for a few weeks and it initially was everything I had hoped. Initially. Now it's not turning on unless I unplug the TV. Sony's response? Factory reset the TV. So yeah not a solution. Yes I did it, no it didn't help. Research in this problem has shown that this has been a known issue since the Oreo update and Sony has no plans to update the 900f further from what I can tell.
customer_reviews.author: xiaolin

customer_reviews.title: Ultra high quality
customer_reviews.text: The picture quality is awesome. Colors are so bright and sharp. Very easy to set up and update. Will buy another for the game room.
customer_reviews.author: G. J.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing picture and performance.
customer_reviews.text: This TV is amazing! Many commented about he Android OS being slow to respond with the menus etc. I don't see this with the 2018 model. Remote and menus work as expected. The picture is stunning - the wireless works fantastic. The ONLY complaint, why does anyone make a remote without illumination for use in the dark?
customer_reviews.author: J. Strong

customer_reviews.title: Amazon as the seller and XPO as delivery is a fantastic combo
customer_reviews.text: The Amazon team and XPO delivery is GREAT!! Delivery was on time, television was well protected. Delivery team treated my new television like it was their own. As for television, set up and programming went well Sony software upgrade made a difference. Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.author: Hardware4you

customer_reviews.title: Excellent High Quality Smart HD Led TV
customer_reviews.text: The initial start-up of the TV does lag on speed (software updating). After this initial set-up, I cannot complain about anything else. I really like the Remote Control that comes with this TV!! It is customizable for any Cable or Satellite Provider (No need for a universal remote control). The TV is filled full of streaming apps and the picture quality is excellent! This TV compared to a recently purchased Samsung TV, I would have to say that Sony has a better product overall! I would recommend this TV to anyone that is considering purchasing a new TV. Spend the extra money on Sony, it is worth it in the long term!
customer_reviews.author: Scott S

customer_reviews.title: Great TV overall.  Blacks are unreal, and color is amazing.
customer_reviews.text: Love this TV - quality is amazing (blacks are deep and colors in HDR are so vivid!). Sounds is good too (way better than I expected) - although I also bought Sony's sound system, I tried the TV speakers and they are decent, to say the least! Delivery was without issues. Overall I'm very impressed with the TV.
customer_reviews.author: Pickle Nose

customer_reviews.title: Blows All Other LEDs Away
customer_reviews.text: The picture quality is so crisp yet easy on the eyes. Blacks are deep and all other colors true. This TV tends to be a bit pricier than similar LEDs in its class, but you can tell the difference when experiencing 4K content. I highly recommend this Sony.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful TV
customer_reviews.text: This TV is fantastic. Integration with fire TV cube is seamless. 4K streaming looks amazing on this big screen. The body is not as slim as some Samsung TVs, but it is not a problem for 75inch size. Minus 1 star for the installation service I purchased along with the TV, it has been a week after the TV was delivered I still haven't been able to have it wall mounted. Services were easy to schedule but the contractor cancelled the appointments twice at the last minute.
customer_reviews.author: delta sigma

customer_reviews.title: So glad I picked this one.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new TV to replace my 2016 Vizio M65-D0 in the bedroom. This one came up for a great price on Amazon and luckily I was able to grab one. It was delivered extremely fast (within 2 days) through Amazon's scheduled delivery. The picture quality is awesome and I love the Android OS. I no longer need to use my firestick with this TV as it has Alexa built in. If you're on the fence about this model go for it. You will not be disappointed. This is my first Sony TV but I'm sure it won't be the last.
customer_reviews.author: J. Graham

customer_reviews.title: Great picture, great quality overall
customer_reviews.text: The size and quality for the sale price I found is excellent. Picture quality is wonderful. Only downsides are that it arbitrarily loses the internet connection. Since the router is literally sitting right behind it, and I’m running at 400MBs, this occasional loss of signal is odd and sometimes annoying. The other thing SONY needs to work out is having an app for Apple+ TV. The much higher end., and far more expensive models connect to Apple+, but they haven’t worked out the software yet (and there may be some legal or financial issues involved).
customer_reviews.author: Steven A. Samnick

customer_reviews.title: Sony price and Sony Quality, worth ever penny!
customer_reviews.text: My last tv was Sony KDL-46 XBR 46-inch 2007 model and it was a great tv with wonderful picture and I never had any problems with it so on deciding to upgrade I went with the Sony XBR55X900F 55-Inch 4K Ultra HD Smart LED TV basing it on what I believe is that Sony has better quality control and there for better dependability, and the picture is even better than the old 46". The new 55-inch Sony 900F was just as easy to set up as my old 46-inch Sony, just a few more steps being it's a smart TV.
customer_reviews.author: KWAllen

customer_reviews.title: Amazing picture quality
customer_reviews.text: The picture quality is simply amazing! There is no blurriness, ghosting or shadowing. I bought this to replace a 65” HD TV and I thought the picture on that was good but the picture on this 4K TV is leaps and bounds better. In my opinion it is worth every penny I spent.
customer_reviews.author: daveyd12

customer_reviews.title: An amazing television!
customer_reviews.text: This TV replaced our 55A2000 SONY TV that was a workhorse for almost 11 years. The 65X900F is feature packed for the videophile yet user-friendly. We heard and read some comments that the android features were laggy; we have not experienced that at all. Prime video, Play Music and all of the other apps works efficiently. The picture on this television is great! We love this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: A.S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Picture
customer_reviews.text: This TV was so easy to set up, we had purchased a Samsung last year for another room and it was a nightmare to setup. This Sony took me about 10 minutes to setup. I have a Bose Solo 15 for sound and it works great..
customer_reviews.author: lkru10

customer_reviews.title: Great picture quality, on screen keyboard not great.
customer_reviews.text: This TV has excellent picture quality. The remote is ok, but nothing special. We have the TV attached to a sound bar so I can’t really say how the sound of the TV itself is. The only annoying part is when entering usernames and passwords for apps or to connect to WiFi, there is no quick way to enter them and some of them take way longer than they should because of the on screen keyboard layout.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon and Amy

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.text: The Sony Bravia picture is at least as good as my Samsung 55". Works with Alexa. Lots of bells and whistles and native apps like NETFLIX and YouTube. I recommend this tv, even at the higher than average cost; not many other 85" tv's out there.
customer_reviews.author: PAUL R FONTENOT

customer_reviews.title: Everything is perfect
customer_reviews.text: I'm watching this TV. I can't even without HDR now. I connected my FreeBSD machine, my Windows 10 laptop, and the HDR Bluray player to it, at the same time, and switch between them smoothly. No compatibility issue isn't fixed by just upgrading my laptop's display driver. The picture is tear-free. The sound quality is also not bad.
customer_reviews.author: Zhihao Yuan

customer_reviews.title: Fine picture quality and solid construction.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first Sony TV, and I have previously bought Vizio LEDs. Picture quality is outstanding. Great for movies and sports. Sound is like any other LED (I use an old Bose cinemate that sound great). The construction is solid, heavy, and understated. Price is kind of high, but I have not seen a better picture LED set.
customer_reviews.author: cone gobbler

customer_reviews.title: Immersive
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned about spending this much on a TV and researched options for several months. Now that I've had it for several weeks, I am glad I bought it. Of course, not all 4K content is created equal and some movies/shows are more impressive than others. Some of the DirecTV and YouTube 4K content is spectacular. FYI we sit about 8' from the screen.
customer_reviews.author: BRUCE MCHOLLAN

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I have had tons of 4k tv's and this is my favorite one so far out of my tops like p65-f1,x900e and vizio quantum m. It has a clarity that the others don't have and just makes everything look better. It is amazing for gaming and looks so great i never want to go to bed lol.
customer_reviews.author: t.b.

customer_reviews.title: Great TV, but intermittent sound with external speakers
customer_reviews.text: This TV has known issues, I wish I had known before purchasing it. The sound is intermittent with external speakers and all Sony forums seem to have no solution for this issue. The picture is great, but the functionality with on-Sony AVRs, HDMI ARC, and with external speakers is horrible. I tried different receivers and the same issues persist. I now want to return the TV for a Samsung, which is what we usually buy.
customer_reviews.author: K. Matheny

customer_reviews.title: Spectacular!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve owned Sony XBRs for years. This is the best one so far. I don’t use the smart features too much, but picture quality, motion etc.. are all top notch. Watching sports, especially horse racing is a delight. For the price, great buy. The delivery was great too. Two guys came in, set it up and handed me the remote. They even took the packaging with them. Didn’t lift a finger.
customer_reviews.author: B. Segovia

customer_reviews.title: Best 75” tv for the price out there
customer_reviews.text: I spent six months researching TVs and after extensive comparisons bought the X900f and couldn’t be happier. The picture clarity and color display is top notch and the price paid is by far the best value for a 75” tv. Nothing on the market comes close to this quality at this price point. I tried both this and the 950G and actually preferred this TVs color display and resolution. A no brained is you are in the market for a TV this size.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Decent tv for the price
customer_reviews.text: The tv has things that are hard to find digging through the menus. It also often gets stuck "tuning channels" so that it has to be shut off and restarted. The remote is easy to use but very cheaply made. Lighted buttons would be so nice like my last tv had. Picture is really nice though!
customer_reviews.author: D. Gross

customer_reviews.title: An accurate display with a nice feature set
customer_reviews.text: Smart features are fine but slow compared to some other units. I don’t personally use them as I have plenty of other devices to accomplish additional connectivity. Picture quality and options of the actual display itself are quite good. I bought this to replace an aging plasma and I’m overall very pleased with the quality of the image. Local dimming works well enough for me and off axis viewing doesn’t degrade the picture too dramatically. All in all, a well built display with a good selection of features. I Bought this set for under $1000 and I think at that price point it is a good value.
customer_reviews.author: imsureitsfine

customer_reviews.title: Extra Awesome
customer_reviews.text: First TV I ordered came a day late and broken. A quick call to Amazon, and a replacement was on it's way. Now that it is on the wall and working, I have to say it was worth the wait. Combined with the newer Xbox which, like the TV, is 4K in one word... Ah-mazing. If you were on the fence about upgrading, get off that fence!
customer_reviews.author: Maestro

customer_reviews.title: Great picture but processor causes OS lag.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first 4k TV. Coming from an old plasma made before 2009 its quite a step up. I'm really impressed. It has dark corners in pics and I've noticed banding once. Never while watching videos. What I don't like is the slow processor. Sometimes the TV is very slow to respond to commands through the remote. This is very noticeable while navigating the OS. It doesn't cause lag during movies that I've ever noticed.
customer_reviews.author: L to the Barker

customer_reviews.title: Great picture, Great gaming tv
customer_reviews.text: I buy only Sony TVs. This tv has an outstanding picture. The picture clarity is great with very good blacks. Not as good as Oled TVs but very good blacks. I don’t see any light bleed and the bezels are maybe half an inch around. As with all flat screens a sound bar is needed for good sound as the television speakers are weak. I love this television and I could not be any happier with my purchase. I hooked my gaming pc to the tv and game at 120fps. So for gaming this tv is a win.
customer_reviews.author: Sippy Cup

customer_reviews.title: Oh My Goodness
customer_reviews.text: This t.v. is so clear, it is as if you are in the middle of the action. The colors are crisp, true to their actual color. I am a lover of horror movies, and watching them on this t.v. makes them even scarier. You actually see the shadowy figure in the shadows. We watched Avatar again as we knew that movie was colorful, and we saw colors and objects that we hadn't see before - it was like we were watching the movie for the first time (and it's one of our favorites so we have seen it numerous times). This t.v. is well worth the price and my family has absolutely no regrets.
customer_reviews.author: Matt n Candy

customer_reviews.title: Besides the black levels being grayish in dark scenes, this TV is great
customer_reviews.text: The biggest downfall is the black levels are noticeably clouded in dark scenes and especially evident in black loading screens (this happens with all non-OLED TVs). I fixed this by adding ambient lighting to the back of the tv. The ambient light makes your eyes interpret the darks darker by contrast. The TV remote is also big and bulky which is fine with me but if you're looking for a sleek modern style, look else where. Picture quality is fantastic especially when watching sports or any fast moving scenes. The upscaling is superb and the screen is very bright which helps fight reflections.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great TV
customer_reviews.text: Welove the picture quality, and now notice the wrinkles on actors faces! haha, but true. The "blacks" are truely black, not just dark grey, so this gves the images real punch. The only odd thing is that we are using the TV stand and I guess for safety, this tilts the TV backwords an inch or two so it can not fall over. Takes a little getting used to but now we dot even notice it anymore.
customer_reviews.author: STEVEN LUTZ

customer_reviews.title: Sony delivers
customer_reviews.text: I initially acquired the LG SK9000 65” and it was decent but not excellent. Picture quality was ok but you could see some pixelization of the screen and also while the 55” of that same TV supports international power supply, the 65” didn’t. Switched to Sony given so many reccomendations and site reviews and it’s an amazing TV. I was concerned about the complexity of the operating system But it’s working well and fast.
customer_reviews.author: Amir Halevy

customer_reviews.title: Useless software
customer_reviews.text: Brand new TV a week into ownership and it continues to disconnect from the wifi. Not just disconnect but throws an error code that wifi can not be enabled at this time. Power off doesn't help, settings don't help, only thing that helps is a factory reset... And I have had to do that twice in two days. Means reentering every account and password. The picture is great, but this is the dumbest smart TV I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Focht

customer_reviews.title: Great TV, Great Supplier
customer_reviews.text: Replacing my twenty year old television was not simple. Researched for two days, made three TV purchases and two returns before I had a working replacement. Walt's TV customer service hung in there with me the entire time, assisting, shipping, polite. After purchasing two televisions that were not Sony, I purchased this Sony TV. Great picture from my DVDs using a new, quality, upscale 4k player, good sound, good price, delivered PROMPTLY. Thanks Walts!
customer_reviews.author: unhappy

customer_reviews.title: Really love this tv
customer_reviews.text: 75” is amazing makes me look at my old 50” like its teeny. Great pics, apps etc. Antenna works better with this then my old tv Only issue is it doesn’t work great with my iPhone
customer_reviews.author: GoldenDoodle Daddy

customer_reviews.title: Best smart tv!
customer_reviews.text: This is our second sony of the same model. We sold our house with our original one and we couldn’t be happier with this tv. The quality is amazing as is the smart features with android tv and chromecast built in too!!
customer_reviews.author: Noel K.

customer_reviews.title: Great Picture with Lots of Smarts
customer_reviews.text: I've been able to download just about any App to this TV. Also like the ability to watch videos right off of a USB flash drive. The TV is able to understand lots of various video file formats. I would only ding the TV for the remote. I wish it was a little more spread out so that some of the buttons were not so close to each other. Occasional I push one button when I meant to push it's neighbor.
customer_reviews.author: PhilsGood

customer_reviews.title: Sony for the win !!!!
customer_reviews.text: One of the most perfect and beatyfull tv on the market I buy it for play videos game and watch movies on 4K is insane guy Sony 100 % Samsung I owner both brand but Sony is superior
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Alvarado

customer_reviews.title: Great features with good picture
customer_reviews.text: I love all the built in smart features. More than any tv I have had so far. All my apps are there and super easy to access. The picture quality is really nice as well.
customer_reviews.author: Hollywood33

customer_reviews.title: Excellent picture, easy set up, excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Without jumping to OLED, this is the best tv out there right now. My only minor gripe is that it is not as smooth in quick motion as I had hoped, even in the "sports" setting. I am sure it is probably smoother than similar non-OLED, as it gets high ratings for this; i was just hoping near flawless on motion.
customer_reviews.author: JMB CT

customer_reviews.title: great TV
customer_reviews.text: I bought a cheapo black friday 75" TV and the picture was awful, so I returned it and bought this Sony TV. This one is amazing. The picture is great, the smart functions, the remote, everything is great. When you're buying a TV of this size, don't go cheap. You won't be happy. You have to go for quality.
customer_reviews.author: M. Parrott

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: It is a great TV. Love that I can program my set top box via the Sony remote. I'm still trying to figure out how to use the Mirroring feature (replicate on the TV whatever you have on your smartphone or iPad.) Sound quality is good. Have it sitting on a table wbut would love to mount it on the wall at some point.
customer_reviews.author: Jerrel R. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: There are two things....
customer_reviews.text: You should never buy cheap. You deserve a good mattress and a good television. This is the best television I have ever seen. The picture is crystal clear. You can see every pore and hair follicle whether you want to or not. Bought the installation package. Money well spent!
customer_reviews.author: John Robert Mobley

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic TV!
customer_reviews.text: TV is fantastic! It replaced a 10 yr old plasma. TV was easy to get out of the box, put together and set up. It's worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Sony XBR49X900F 49-Inch in FANTASTIC
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice TV. Great picture and decent sound. We bought a Bose sounder to use with it and it took some time to get it sounding properly. The smart apps and content is mediocre. It really should come with a wireless keyboard so you can type. The flow is not easy for setup. However, all in all, it has performed great! I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: ChopperPilot#1

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Just got TV set up was pretty easy when you got a teenager as your side kick. Picture was great dark spot was easy to identify. You do have to point the remote right at it not at an angle,no side shoots, no from across the room. Netflix was all, I tried so far works great just still trying to figure the remote when show ends how to get back to main window. Otherwise so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Hippy girl 16

customer_reviews.title: Wifi will not stay connected. Picture good, but not as good as the older "E" model I also own.
customer_reviews.text: E model has had no issues. Several trouble calls with Sony and even tech visit to replace the main board has not resolved the wifi connectivity issue. Sony's technical support team so far is recommending for me to purchase additional equipment to work around their issue with the TV. I have an older model "E" series XBR, that TV along with all other internet devices have zero similar issues.
customer_reviews.author: James M Herbert

customer_reviews.title: Used TV was delivered when new was purchased
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this TV brand new and when we unpacked it, the packaging looked like it could have been opened before, well sure enough we went the the trouble of plugging it in and the Tv was in used condition and damaged. The ports were all labeled and the TV never went though the new set up screen. Very upset and disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Irene Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Great picture, easy setup.
customer_reviews.text: Tv was delivered on time in the 12-3pm window selected, set up , plugged in, tested remote. I set up the tv today ., easy two cables power and HDMI 4k arc to my Onkyo receiver. Works great beautiful picture. If I have any issues , I will update.
customer_reviews.author: crichcreek

customer_reviews.title: Great TV
customer_reviews.text: Great TV. I'm satisfied with the purchase. I was deciding between the Sony X950G and the Sony X900F. I believe that this is TV was the right choice for me. The operating system doesn't seem slow like reviewers had mentioned. That may be because the OS has been updated since the original reviews. TCL has was also considered, but I didn't want to deal with the banding issues. A Best Buy employee said that they won't sell a long extended warranty on the TCL TVs due to quality issues.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Twain

customer_reviews.title: Incredible!
customer_reviews.text: I chose this over the LG B8 and I couldn't be happier. Picture quality is phenomenal despite not being OLED and the TV itsekf looks great. Material is a dark brushed aluminum instead of the black plastic most manufacturers use. I would give this TV six stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Jacksonville019283

customer_reviews.title: Android, Schmandroid
customer_reviews.text: I long ago gave up on the Android features on my Sony. I enjoy the TV- it's worth the price- but the remote and the apps available to Android are pitiful. I tried to set up Cyberghost with an app on the Android and it never 'took'. A frustrated hour or two later, I hooked up my Roku Ultra and live on that side of my network. Android is something I suffer through only when I wait for the TV to boot up. Yawn. Interminable minutes of watching ANDROID morph. Double yawn. Sony is falling apart. Sad.
customer_reviews.author: ShknBkVgn

customer_reviews.title: so far, very happy with tv
customer_reviews.text: looked at a number of tv options and read a lot of reviews, etc, and ended up buying this Sony. So far, we have been very happy with the tv. the picture is very nice, and all of the features needed and some unneeded are there. occasional issues with the remote, but nothing major as it is also operating the cable box rather than using that remote too. would buy again, and actually did buy the same tv in a 49" version also, and also happy with that one.
customer_reviews.author: mjn

customer_reviews.title: TV is ok but smart tv functions and interface to a Sony sound bar are poor
customer_reviews.text: Just hate the interface to the smart TV functions - I expected much more form a SONY TV. Also purchased the TV along with the HT-X9000F sound bar and woofer. Sound is mediocre at best and the whole thing doesn't even turn off at the same time. Do these guys even try to use their own product? When I shut the TV off the sound goes off for a second then it turns back on for a couple of seconds before going off again. Just really annoying!
customer_reviews.author: Denis

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Picture Quality
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy with this purchase. I was nervous about purchasing online and having it delivered but it all worked out great. The delivery person even called me to let me know he had delivered my TV so it was not just sitting outside. The TV itself is just what we expected. The quality of Sony with a great picture. We have had no problems with this TV and wish all our TV's were this nice
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful picture quality
customer_reviews.text: I love this TV. I only use it as a display for my Apple TV, and have other speakers for the sound. The colors and brightness are wonderful. The built-in Android TV user interface is horrible, but I only need to use it once in a great while to install updates from Sony, so that's not really a concern for me.
customer_reviews.author: David D. Mcnerney

customer_reviews.title: CLAIMED HDR
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this for the XBOX one because it claimed HDR. Not the case. Don't buy if your trying to pass all the Xbox requirements, or If you enjoy football. Response time is slow. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: jason

customer_reviews.title: Great TV!
customer_reviews.text: This is an exceptional tv for the money. A 2018 model that easily competes with 2020 models. You can’t go wrong. We are really impressed with the picture quality, brightness, and blacks. Can’t comment on the sound, as we use a SONOs Beam.
customer_reviews.author: JohnR3524

customer_reviews.title: Top Quality TV
customer_reviews.text: We love this TV! Had the same model 65” and upgraded to the 85”. Picture quality is awesome! I researched 85” options and the reviews on this TV are spot on. I highly recommend and would buy this TV again in a heartbeat
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Believe the other reviews - Terrible Dolby Vision picture
customer_reviews.text: This TV allegedly supports Dolby Vision but the picture quality is extremely bad - it's very dark. I ended up returning this TV (despite buying at a great price) and getting the X950G model, which has a "Dolby Vision Bright" mode. Much happier with that model.
customer_reviews.author: Danny M

customer_reviews.title: Visually perfect
customer_reviews.text: Loved the picture quality. Excellent contrast. i use the personal hotspot on my phone for a wifi connection since I do not have another option. The tv connects perfectly. The app selection on the tv is more than adequate. I have watched several productions through the Amazon video app. I am very pleased with my purchase so far.
customer_reviews.author: Marlane F Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Sony Died, Won't Reset
customer_reviews.text: Sony reset instructions do not work. Customer services is non existent. I expect that from other companies. Buy a TLC. If it dies in a few years who still saved hundreds of $dollars. Sony customers for 30 years. Never again.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Motyl

customer_reviews.title: STUNNING PICTURE
customer_reviews.text: The most stunning picture on any tv I have ever seen. I have always had Sony TVs (have a few small other brands for things like kitchen etc) and they have always been the very best. We were ready to upgrade our living room tv to 4K, did extensive research, and determined this was the best choice for the very best price. Couldn’t be happier!!!
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Cracked screen
customer_reviews.text: Would likely be a good tv of screen wasn’t cracked. Since I didn’t hook it up as soon as I got it the return window expired. Not pleased with the paperweight I’ve got
customer_reviews.author: erik folkes

customer_reviews.title: Great TV for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my purchase. I've had the TV for about a month now. Picture quality varies depending on source, but Blu-Rays and UHD-4k Blu-Rays look stunning. Regular cable HD looks good also as the tv does a great job of up converting non 4k content. Black levels also very good, not OLED good but close. For the price it's an outstanding TV. Sound quality is lacking, but I use a sound bar for daily viewing and a full surround sound system on movie nights.
customer_reviews.author: Erwin Samida

customer_reviews.title: great tv
customer_reviews.text: really enjoy the picture quality, great. followed setup instructions on tv and had no issues getting to work. the vivid mode is fantastic. with the brightness up it can really get bright. mechanical and electrical setup very easy. would recommend for those looking for a great tv with taking the leap to a more expensive OLED tv.
customer_reviews.author: kuni

customer_reviews.title: Sux!
customer_reviews.text: This television is not appropriate for Apple phones as I can find out. It is an android television and better suited for android phones. It does not work properly with an iPhone which I think was really inconvenient. Nevertheless Amazon shipment never came and I found this out from buying the television at a different vendor and returning it to them
customer_reviews.author: JoePoe

customer_reviews.title: Quality over user-friendly.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent image and sound quality, 5/5. The remote control can be confusing for the elderly. Too many unnecessary extra buttons, but please don’t let that lean you toward not purchasing this tv. The quality far outways the features.
customer_reviews.author: Noemi Medina

customer_reviews.title: Easy-to-use and easier to set up!
customer_reviews.text: The TV is great so far. I just set it up last night and the installation was incredibly easy. It took no more than 40 minutes, tops! The picture quality and sound quality are great so far and the Alexa compatibility is perfect. However, the TV does stand up pretty high, so if you don't have a sound bar, you are left with a bit of negative space between the bottom of the TV and the legs. This probably won't bother many people.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlynn Cooney

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Picture
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality is fantastic. We upgraded from an 8 year old plasma with lots of dead spots so anything would look good but this really sets the bar high. Couldn’t be happier with the tv. We use a harmony remote and an Apple TV for a media center so I can’t speak into the smart features or remote but would recommend the tv to anyone looking in this price point!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great TV - Crap Smart Interface
customer_reviews.text: Bought this tv because of rtings.com. Picture quality is amazing. I do connect it to a speaker system because internal audio can't compete. A big negative is the tv's smart interface, Android TV. It is Google so they're obviously tracking everything you do, ridiculously slow, and limited in what you can download. Picked up a Roku Ultra which is far superior.
customer_reviews.author: C H

customer_reviews.title: Randomly turns on by itself!
customer_reviews.text: I love the tv, beautiful pic. What I dislike is that it randomly turns on and it never fails, I’m either out of town or not home. I know because it makes my security camera go crazy. I called Sony and they have no clue. I read lots of stuff online as this is more common if a problem then I realized but NOTHING WORKS! The really need an update to stop this problem.
customer_reviews.author: Jendressel3

customer_reviews.title: Awesome TV! Looks stunning!
customer_reviews.text: What a great TV, so impressed with the picture and all the cool 4k content. I have an Xbox one X for gaming and a Sony ubp x700 4k bluray player for Dolby vision 4k movies, with an onyko Dolby atmos surround sound system. Upgraded from a vizio 65 3dtv, what a difference. Delivery was great and early by almost a week which was a very pleasant surprise. One of the best 4ktvs on the market that's not oled.
customer_reviews.author: ryan l

customer_reviews.title: Sony smart television is great
customer_reviews.text: Did not see a sleep timer on the remote. The only dislike. The television is awesome the price was right delivered on time picture quality fabulous enjoying everything.
customer_reviews.author: Jacky h

customer_reviews.title: Great TV Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great TV.... nice pict. Lots of features and apps available. I bought this along with the Samsung 60...Samsung has a nicer pict and even more features but As a master TV it’s great. I paired it with the Sony 1080 recv and Klipsch 6000 floor standing and center speaks and it came alive
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: What can I say it's a Sony
customer_reviews.text: Also have a high end samsung in the same room. It doesn't compare. And for anyone who doesn't know any better when you go to buy a television. Ask the salesmen for the remotes and reset the pictures. You will see what I mean. Pictures are set so retailer sells what they make the most on looks the best.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Desiderio

customer_reviews.title: Great Picture quality!
customer_reviews.text: This TV has a chromecast TV embedded into it providing all kind of smart features: this is not a selling point for me as I don't like TV to listen to my private conversation ;-) , hence i disabled wifi and hooked up a 4k apple tv so now I can access to dolby vision content that is fabulous for my eyes. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: dom

customer_reviews.title: Top notch UHD 4K.
customer_reviews.text: XBR’s are in my opinion the best consumer tv’s on the market, always have been. Totallt worth the extra bux!!!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Rodriguez

product_meta.title: Sony XBR75X900F 75-Inch 4K Ultra HD Smart LED Android TV with Alexa Compatibility - 2018 Model
product_meta.description: Size:75 inches| Style:TVBEYOND HIGH DEFINITION The Sony X900F model television offers the best in 4K HD TV picture quality. With stunning clarity plus high dynamic range color, contrast and detail, and full-array local dimming technology, enjoy a lifelike picture, enhanced contrast and remarkable brightness packed inside an incredibly slim design. ENHANCED QUALITY Featuring the X1 Extreme Processor, 4K X-Reality PRO and X-tended Dynamic Range PRO 6X, this to offers superior brightness and a wide contrast range for a premium 4K television experience. Enjoy detailed and powerful real-time image processing whether you are surfing channels, watching a movie or playing a video game. PREMIUM DISPLAY The Sony X900F includes X-Motion Clarity technology and a TRILUMINOS display. X-Motion offers the best in fast action clarity to control blurriness and maintain smooth, clear and bright images whether you are watching a high-speed chase in an action movie or speed skating. TRILUMINOS combined with 4K HDR Super Bit Mapping provides the widest, brightest and most vivid color palette seen on a to. VOICE CONTROL This to offers voice control compatibility with Alexa and Google Home. Ask your to do things like cast and control videos from YouTube with Google Home or change the channel or volume with Alexa. And, with built-in Google Assistant, talk into your remote to play your favorite movie, check the score of your favorite team, and control your TV and even your home. MULTIPLE INPUTS Currently supporting HDR10, HLG and Dolby Vision, this to features 4 HDMI, 2 USB2. 0, 1 USB3. 0 and 1 Composite port for a variety of input/output options for easy switching between your favorite devices, gaming consoles and more. BOX INCLUDES Voice Remote Control, Batteries, AC Power Cord Spec (US, 2pin, flat blades, Polarity), IR Blaster, Operating Instructions, Quick Setup Guide / Supplement CUE, Table Top Stand (Assembly required). Smartphone connectivity - Chromecast built-in
feature_bullets: Beyond High Definition: 4K UHD HDR picture offers stunning clarity, color range and detail
Enhanced Quality: With the X1 Extreme Processor enjoy controlled contrast & wide range of brightness.
Say It. See It.: Connect Alexa to your TV to stream smart camera feeds with your voice, play music, launch video apps, and more; Compatible with Amazon Alexa & Google Home
Premium Display: Enjoy Vibrant Colors with Triluminos & Clear on Screen Action with X-Motion Clarity
Dimensions(WxHxD): Without Stand 66 x 37 3/4 x 2 7/8 inches, with Stand 66 x 40 3/4 x 14 inches
Multiple Inputs: 4 HDMI, 2 USB2.0, 1 USB3.0 & 1 Composite Port to Easily Switch Inputs
Box Includes: Voice Remote, Batteries, Power Cord, IR Blaster, Operating Manual, Setup Guide & Stand

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars1,137 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
